tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE financial_calculators (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  calculator_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  data_source VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE FinancialCalculator (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  calculator_name VARCHAR(255),
  calculation_type VARCHAR(50),
  api_endpoint VARCHAR(255),
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE UserData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  user_role VARCHAR(50),
  last_login TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE FinancialData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  calculator_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  input_data JSONB,
  result_data JSONB,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
